alert.note: Alert for Inland Palm Beach County (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 15 at 2:46PM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Palm Beach County through 330 PM EDT... At 245 PM EDT, National Weather Service meteorologists were tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Belle Glade Camp to 6 miles east of Okeelanta to 6 miles northeast of Holey Land Wildlife Refuge. Movement was east at 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Belle Glade, South Bay, Okeelanta and Belle Glade Camp. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: These winds can down small tree limbs and branches, and blow around unsecured small objects. Seek shelter in a safe building until the storm passes. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
